title: The Sharpest Edge
description: Sword-bearer Shkai'ra and her companion, Megan, dagger-wielding thief and mistress of illusion, are caught in a life-or-death struggle between rival magical powers as a deadly secret threatens to destroy the balance of peace and the Fehinnan Empire.This book has been revised and republished as Saber and Shadow.
author: S.M. Stirling
